screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xpl file in Objective Development Little Snitch 4
screenshot.caption: XPL file open in Objective Development Little Snitch 4

description: You will most likely only encounter an XPL configuration file if you use Little Snitch in macOS to monitor your applications' Internet connections. To create an XPL file with Little Snitch Configuration, select File → Create Backup... . To add a new rule to a configuration, select File → New Rule... , then save the XPL configuration file again.
XPL files are saved in a proprietary format and can only be opened with Little Snitch. To open an XPL file with Little Snitch Configuration follow these steps:
